mapper.select: SELECT devName,SC_PART as 'sc_part',SC_CONTENT as 'sc_content',RESULT 'result',ALTPID AS 'altpid' FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE TASKSTART_TM>="${startTime}" AND "${endTime}">TASKSTART_TM AND DEPT_NAME="${deptName}" and "${routeNames}" LIKE CONCAT("%",ROUTE_NAME,"%")

SELECT a.deptName,a.station,a.team,GROUP_CONCAT(b.routeName) routeName FROM dxj_jjb_station_user a ,dxj_jjb_station b WHERE a.userId="${userId}" AND a.deptName=b.deptName AND a.station=b.station GROUP BY a.deptName,a.station
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(routeName) as 'routeName' ,a.deptName,a.station from dxj_jjb_station a,dxj_jjb_station_user b WHERE b.userId="${userId}" AND a.deptName=b.deptName AND a.station=b.station
SELECT * FROM dxj_jjb_sk_sh WHERE param1="${deptName}" AND param2="${station}" AND dete="${date}" AND shift="${shift}"
